message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $95?
